attributes.action: Give nurses the same pay rises as members of parliament
attributes.additional_details: I think nurses have always been under paid. With the passing of this bill we can show them they are appreciated as much as we appreciate our elected members of parliament.
attributes.background: Debate if it’s fair that members of Parliament get larger pay increases than nurses. If members of Parliament think nurses should get the same increase in pay as them , then let’s vote and have a bill  passed in parliament.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513
